abstract: Valsgard Journal; Danish idea of recruiting industrial architects to help design less aesthetically intrusive pylons to support the high-tension power lines that carry electricity across the country is gaining traction internationally.
snippet: To deal with resistance to new high-tension power lines, the Danes hit on the idea of involving industrial architects in the pylons’ design.
lead_paragraph: To deal with resistance to new high-tension power lines, the Danes hit on the idea of involving industrial architects in the pylons’ design.

headline.main: Dressing Up Power Lines Comes With Limits
headline.print_headline: Dressing Up Power Lines Comes With Limits
headline.seo: Dressing Up Power Lines Comes With Limits in Denmark
